definition: the pleasing scent produced when incense is burned, make furious
details:
noun
- the pleasing scent produced when incense is burned
= example: the pleasing scent produced when incense is burned
- a substance that produces a fragrant odor when burned
verb
- make furious
= synonyms: exasperate, infuriate
- perfume especially with a censer
= synonyms: cense, thurify
